Juicy Gummy Rings with a Cherry Taste

     Kervan Cherry Rings are one of the world's finest gummy candies. These juicy, cherry-flavoured treats taste like they were freshly picked from the cherry orchard in Candyland. And there, over the horizon, a unicorn is running free. Sweet Dreams Live Here! 

Kervan Cherry Rings Bulk Candy is a sweet addition to any Candy Buffet or Corporate Event.

entry.title: Welch's Juicefuls Mixed Fruit - 4oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Welch's
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Jaw-Dropping Juice in Every Bite!

    Just one Welch's Juicefuls Fruit Snack is enough to realize just how irresistible these pockets of real fruit juice are! Bursting with delicious mixed fruity flavours, these chewy gummies ooze with juice the moment you bite into them. Featuring Peach, Strawberry, Orange, Grape, and Raspberry, one pack isn't enough to satisfy the craving these snacks will kick-start!

  • Made with Natural Flavours and Colours
  • Made with Real Fruit
  • Gluten-Free
  • Excellent Source of Vitamins A, C, & E

See the juice, taste the fruit!

    (1 pack) 4oz / 113g

entry.title: Sweetarts Ropes Bites King Size - 3.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle Candy Shop
Type: Candy
Price: 2.99

A Share Pack to King Size Your Enjoyment!

    The ropes you’ve come to love are now bite-sized! SweeTARTS Ropes Bites are soft and chewy with a delicious fruit-punch filling. Bite-sized nuggets feature a sour chewy outside with a sweet, soft inside that include flavours of Orange, Strawberry, Green Apple, Cherry, and Blue Punch. Willy Wonka would be proud!

(1 share sized pack) 3.5oz / 100g

entry.title: Haribo Starbeams - 160g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Haribo
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

A Fresh Fruity Treat From Haribo UK

   A delicious mix of sweet foam and soft jelly, these gummy candies made with fruit juice come in 3 tasty flavours: Cherry, Apple, and Lemon. With bright colours, you'll feel positively uplifted chewing on these sweet treats! They're also suitable for vegetarians, so you can share them with more of your friends and family. 

Kids and grown-ups love it so... the happy world of Haribo!

  

﻿(1 bag) 160g

entry.title: Haribo Sour Sparks - 160g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Haribo
Type: Candy
Price: 3.99

Don't Shock Yourself On These Sour Bolts!

   These may look like your typical gummy candy, but beware! - there's a sour surprise in the centre. Each bolt gummy has a unique dual flavour combination, there's pineapple & raspberry, cola & lemon, and apple & cherry! These gummies are also vegetarian, making them safe to share with more of your friends and family. 

   We hope you like the flavour, they're electrifying!

Kids and grown-ups love it so... the happy world of Haribo!

  

﻿(1 bag) 160g

entry.title: Haribo Cherry Cola - 200g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Haribo
Type: Candy
Price: 4.49

Haribo Kirsch-Cola

From the Original Gummy Candy company from Germany. Haribo Candy has been thrilling Candy Lovers since 1920. That's a long, but very sweet, time!

Haribo Cherry Cola Gummi Candy are a delicious twist on the the classic Retro Candy with the original cola flavour. These pocket sized bottles are two-toned in red and brown and are now bursting with a sweet and smooth cherry cola flavour. What a wonderful combination that creates a tingling and fruity experience. Open a bag today and quench your thirst! Without artificial dyes. Suitable for vegetarians.

 

200 g Bag

entry.title: Kervan Assorted Dinosaurs Gummy Candy - 5lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kervan USA
Type: Bulk
Price: 24.99

Kervan Gourmet Gummy Candy

Kervan Dinosaurs Gummy Candies are one of the world's sweetest candy creatures and are made with the finest ingredients. These Dinosaur shaped candies may ROAR! but they don't bite! The only one doing any biting around here is you, as you enjoy their yummy fruity flavours. The assorted fruit flavours come in the colours of cherry red, lime green, blue raspberry blue, and lemon yellow.

Kervan Assorted Dinosaur Bulk Candy is a sweet addition to any Candy Buffet or Corporate Event.

  • Halal Candy
  • Made in Turkey
  • Made with the finest ingredients

5 lbs Bulk Candy 

Ingredients: 
Corn Syrup, Sugar, Beef Gelatine, Citric Acid, Palm Oil, Artificial Flavors, Carnauba Wax, Artificial Colors [Yellow #5 (E102), Blue #1 (E133), Red #40 (E129)] Produced in a facility that also processes gluten, soy lecithin, tree nuts, milk and products of milk.
